name: FaithBaptistRinggold
0:
”Alexa, open faith baptist ringgold”
”Alexa, ask faith baptist ringgold for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start faith baptist ringgold”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: faith baptist ringgold
des: We invite you to listen to the latest From The Pulpit of Faith Baptist Church in Ringgold Virginia. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to messages you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current message. You can also ask for previous and next message by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
